alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 2:21PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Baldwin County through 300 PM CDT... At 220 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Spanish Fort to Daphne to 6 miles west of Point Clear. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daphne, Fairhope, Spanish Fort, Robertsdale, Loxley, Stapleton, Summerdale and Silverhill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
